00018 namespace BulletHell.Game.Library.Behavior
00019 {
00020     public class ShootingStraightAngleBehavior : Behavior
00021     {
00022         private double x;
00023         private double y;
00024 
00025         private float targetAngle;
00026 
00027         public ShootingStraightAngleBehavior(EnemyPlaneObj parent)
00028             : base(parent)
00029         {
00030             behaviorState = BehaviorState.ShootStraightAngle;
00031         }
00032 
00033         public override Behavior clone(EnemyPlaneObj newParent)
00034         {
00035             return new ShootingStraightAngleBehavior(newParent);
00036         }
00037 
00038         internal override void Update(Map map, GameTime gameTime)
00039         {
00040             x = map.hero.position.X - parent.position.X;
00041             y = map.hero.position.Y - parent.position.Y;
00042 
00043             targetAngle = (float)(Math.PI * 2 - Math.Atan2(y, x));
00044             parent.shootStraight(parent.bulletSelection, parent.BulletType[parent.bulletSelection].BulletAmount,
00045 
00046             /* Lerp adds unpredictability to the bullet */
00047             MathHelper.Lerp(parent.BulletType[parent.bulletSelection].BulletDensity * 0.9f,
00048             parent.BulletType[parent.bulletSelection].BulletDensity * 1.1f,
00049             (float)rand.NextDouble()) * 5,
00050 
00051             /* Lerp adds unpredictability to the bullet */
00052             MathHelper.Lerp(parent.BulletType[parent.bulletSelection].BulletDensity * 0.9f,
00053             parent.BulletType[parent.bulletSelection].BulletDensity * 1.1f,
00054             (float)rand.NextDouble()) * 3, targetAngle);
00055         }
00056     }
